verbose_text: In this model, the DLD-1 cells were stimulated with TGF-beta1 (10 ng/ml) for 24, 48 and 72 h. Real-time PCR and western blot analysis demonstrated that TGF-beta1 mediated repression of E-cadherin, and induction of N-cadherin, alpha-SMA, fibronectin, and vimentin.
evidence: TGF-beta1 mediated repression of E-cadherin, and induction of N-cadherin, alpha-SMA, fibronectin, and vimentin
